snippet: LEAD: The CBS television network affiliate in Los Angeles, KCBS, announced yesterday that it had agreed to broadcast a debate between the contenders for the Democratic nomination for governor of California, Dianne Feinstein and John K. Van de Kamp...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: The CBS television network affiliate in Los Angeles, KCBS, announced yesterday that it had agreed to broadcast a debate between the contenders for the Democratic nomination for governor of California, Dianne Feinstein and John K. Van de Kamp, on Sunday afternoon, May 20.

headline.main: Switch Seen as Station Agrees to Show Debate
